content:
There are no major errors in this translation. 

Minor errors:
(1) "old" - Mistranslation
(2) "south" - Mistranslation
Based on the above error information, Output 2 numbers ONLY with the format: "x, x", indicating the number of major and minor errors. DO NOT ADD other information!

Major errors:
(1) "Central Military-Civilian Integration Office" - Mistranslation
(2) "State Administration of Science and Industry for National Defense" - Mistranslation
(3) "revolutionary base areas" - Mistranslation
(4) "interface" - Mistranslation

Minor errors:
(1) "Remain true to our original aspiration and keep our mission firmly in mind" - Mistranslation
(2) "advantageous private enterprises" - Mistranslation
(3) "review the history of the revolution" - Mistranslation
(4) "pass on the red genes" - Mistranslation
(5) "related enterprises" - Mistranslation
(6) "revolutionary areas" - Mistranslation
Based on the above error information, Output 2 numbers ONLY with the format: "x, x", indicating the number of major and minor errors. DO NOT ADD other information!

There are no major errors in the translation.

Minor errors:
(1) "Deputy Director" - Mistranslation of "executive deputy director"
(2) "United Front Work Department of the Central Committee" - Omission of "CPC"
(3) "Party Secretary" - Mistranslation of "secretary of the CPC leading party group"
(4) "National Defense Science and Industry Bureau" - Mistranslation of "State Administration of Science and Industry for National Defense"
(5) "Jiangxi Provincial Committee" - Mistranslation of "Jiangxi Provincial Party Committee"
(6) "research" - Mistranslation of "survey"
Based on the above error information, Output 2 numbers ONLY with the format: "x, x", indicating the number of major and minor errors. DO NOT ADD other information!

Major errors:
(1) "Minkou" - Mistranslation
(2) "Research Xiang Group" - Mistranslation
Minor errors:
(1) "research activities" - Mistranslation
(2) "groups" - Mistranslation
(3) "China Aerospace Science and Technology Group Co., Ltd." - Omission
(4) "Hunan Rare Earth Metal Materials Research Institute" - Inappropriate for context
(5) "Yanxiang Group" - Spelling
Based on the above error information, Output 2 numbers ONLY with the format: "x, x", indicating the number of major and minor errors. DO NOT ADD other information!
